bibl.title: ÉIsapÒllvn / EﬁsapÒllvn: nomen delendum lexicis. <Isapollon, Eisapollon>
bibl.note: None of the alleged instances of ÉIsapÒllvn / EﬁsapÒllvn is fully defensible. The name, therefore, may be confidently declared a 'ghost' and excised from the onomastic lexica. <Isapollon, Eisapollon>
bibl.seg: BENAISSA Amin, ÉIsapÒllvn / EﬁsapÒllvn: nomen delendum lexicis. <Isapollon, Eisapollon>
